name: Modern War FPS Shooting
description:
Modern War FPS Shooting!!!
Play as amazing war commando world war sniper hero by hunting malicious german soldiers. Go on shooting in world wide duty in free fps game. Strike with bullets first on enemy followers by choosing a different weapon and complete each mission to win the second war.
Features:
• Optimal gameplay for FPS game players
• Amazing 3D graphics for fighting and shooting war ground
• Artillery choices to select M1911, MPS, AK47, M4, short-gun, sniper rifle
• Numerous missions and assignments to complete
• Easy and smooth controls for precise shooting
• Astonishing sound effects and background music.
